message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product and I think it would be perfect for you. I'm asking for $150, which is a fair price considering its value. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but $150 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $150 represents the value of the product, I'm willing to come down to $130 to make this a good deal for both of us. What do you say?
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $130, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so how about $110?
